articles.title: Twin NASA Mars probes will fly on 2nd-ever launch of Blue Origin's huge New Glenn rocket - Space
articles.description: The launch of NASA's ESCAPADE mission could take place as soon as Aug. 15.
articles.content:
A NASA Mars mission's long and winding road to the launch pad is nearing its end.
